name: Blue Aztec Pocket T-shirt Unisex
description:
Hand made Aztec print pocket on Regular fit Gildan unisex t-shirt, which is 100% cotton. Currently available in black, white, grey, maroon and navy from size S-XL.  This design is limited. 

Size Chart (width x length): 
Small - 18 x 28 inches 
Medium - 20 x 29 inches
Large - 22 x 30 inches
X-Large - 24 x 31 inches
2X -Large - 26 x 32 inches
Double the width to get the Chest Size.

All orders could take up to 5 working days to be dispatched, as they are hand made.

All overseas orders, please allow up to 3 working weeks for delivery as they are being shipped from the UK.

For bulk orders please contact us at patchworkapparel@hotmail.co.uk.


Check out my blog http://patchpocket.tumblr.com/ for more pictures and updates on new designs. Thanks for your interest!

Please note, pattern may vary slightly.
No returns.
